about.description: This is a app to show the upcoming departures of ferries operated by the Swedish Färjerederiet (Trafikverket).
about.libility: It is created by Linus Romland, Trafikverket is not liable for any flaws of the app.
about.contact: Contact and more information is available at https://ferrydepartures.com/
